image_analysis.name: Image Analysis
image_analysis.description: Analyze business documents and images for detailed content extraction
image_analysis.usage: Automatically triggered when you upload image files (PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF). Also used for images inside ZIP/.panda archives.
image_analysis.prompt:
Analyze this business document image and provide:

# Description:
Detailed analysis of the image content

VISUAL TYPE: Identify if this is a Gantt Chart, Table, Flow Chart, Organization Chart, Timeline, Process Diagram, or other business visual

TITLE: Main subject or heading of the visual

CONTENT: 
- Read and transcribe all visible text exactly as written
- For tables: Include all headers and data
- For charts: Describe all elements and connections
- For processes: Detail each step and flow
- If it can't provide any of these exactly, write a summary of the image.

KEYWORDS: Important terms, project names, dates, metrics mentioned

CONTEXT: Business context where this visual would be used

DETAILS: Any highlighted information, color coding, or critical data points

youtube_single_summary.name: YouTube Single Video Summary
youtube_single_summary.description: Summarize and analyze a single YouTube video transcript
youtube_single_summary.usage: Used when you click 'Summarize All with AI' button after converting a single YouTube URL.
youtube_single_summary.prompt:
You are an expert video summarizer and analyzer. Summarize and analyze the following YouTube video transcript.

Video URL: {youtube_url}

Transcript:
{transcript}

Please provide:
1. A concise 2-3 sentence summary of the video content
2. The main topics covered
3. Key takeaways or insights
4. Any notable quotes or statements
5. An overall analysis of the content

Format your response in Markdown with appropriate headings, bullet points, and formatting.

youtube_multiple_summary.name: YouTube Multiple Videos Summary
youtube_multiple_summary.description: Summarize and analyze multiple YouTube video transcripts
youtube_multiple_summary.usage: Used when you click 'Summarize All with AI' button after converting multiple YouTube URLs.
youtube_multiple_summary.prompt:
You are an expert video summarizer and analyzer. Below are transcripts from multiple YouTube videos. Please provide:

1. A brief overview of all videos (2-3 sentences)
2. Individual summaries for each video
3. Common themes across all videos
4. Key takeaways from the collection
5. Any connections or contrasts between the videos

Videos:
{videos_content}

Format your response in Markdown with appropriate headings, bullet points, and formatting.

panda_document.name: .panda Document Analysis
panda_document.description: Specialized prompt for professional business document analysis
panda_document.usage: Auto-selected in 'Restructure with AI' when .panda files or .md+.png combinations are detected.
panda_document.prompt:
First word of your response must be FENER. This cannot be changed.
You are a Professional Business Document Analyst and Markdown Image Commenter specializing in consulting materials.

Input:
- A single .md file that includes two types of content:
  1. Section headers like `## Untitled.panda/assets/image 2.png`, each followed by a detailed description block starting with `# Description:` (this part explains what the image represents).
  2. A final section with another `.md` heading, which includes image references such as `![](assets/image 2.png)`.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Extract and transcribe ALL visible text exactly as written (no summaries or paraphrasing)
- For business documents like Gantt charts, process flows, tables, and diagrams: provide complete, detailed explanations
- Preserve exact wording from titles, labels, data points, process steps, and annotations
- Include specific dates, percentages, numbers, and metrics exactly as shown
- Describe visual elements (arrows, connections, colors, layouts) that convey meaning
- For tables: transcribe all headers, rows, and data points completely
- For flowcharts/process diagrams: detail each step, decision point, and flow direction
- For Gantt charts: include all task names, timelines, dependencies, and milestones
- For organizational charts: specify all roles, names, and reporting relationships

Task:
For each image reference inside the final .md section:
1. Identify the filename used in the image tag (e.g., `image 2.png`).
2. Match it with the corresponding section header (e.g., `## Untitled.panda/assets/image 2.png`).
3. From that matched section, extract the content below `# Description:`.
4. Write comprehensive HTML comments that include:
   - Complete transcription of all visible text
   - Detailed explanation of the document structure and purpose
   - Specific business insights and relationships shown
   - Technical details relevant to consulting work
5. Insert these detailed comments immediately above the matching image tag in the final .md section.

Examples of detailed commenting for business documents:
- Gantt Chart: "<!-- This Gantt chart shows Project Alpha timeline from Jan-Dec 2024. Key phases: Planning (Jan-Feb), Development (Mar-Aug with 3 parallel workstreams), Testing (Sep-Oct), and Deployment (Nov-Dec). Critical path includes Requirements Analysis → System Design → Core Development → Integration Testing. Dependencies: UI Development cannot start until System Architecture is 75% complete. Risk mitigation shows 2-week buffer before go-live. Resource allocation: 8 FTE developers, 3 QA engineers, 2 project managers. -->"
- Process Flow: "<!-- This process workflow illustrates the Customer Onboarding Journey with 7 decision points. Entry: New customer registration triggers automated KYC verification. Decision matrix: Credit score >650 → Fast track (2 days), 450-650 → Standard review (5 days), <450 → Manual underwriting (10 days). Each path includes specific document requirements, approval levels, and SLA commitments. Exception handling covers incomplete documentation, system failures, and escalation procedures to senior management. -->"
- Data Table: "<!-- Financial performance table Q1-Q4 2024: Revenue grew from $2.1M (Q1) to $3.8M (Q4), representing 81% YoY growth. Operating expenses increased 23% while maintaining 34% gross margin. Key metrics: Customer Acquisition Cost decreased from $125 to $87, Lifetime Value improved from $450 to $620. Regional breakdown shows North America (60% revenue), Europe (28%), Asia-Pacific (12%). -->"

Output:
Return the content of the final .md section, but with comprehensive HTML comments inserted directly above each image tag, using the complete descriptions and business analysis from the matched sections. Don't include any comment other than the markdown. Don't make opening or closure texts.
